text: Va yo nabhana ki yadi hamimathi pani kitaba utari'eko bha'e hami tiniharuko damjo ajha sahi batoma hune thiyaum. Tasartha timro samipama timro palanakartako tarphabata spasta, margadarsanako madhyama ra varadana a'isakeko cha. Aba tyobhanda thulo atyacari ko hola, jasale allahako ayataharula'i galata bhandacha ra tyasabata arula'i vimukha gardacha. Jasale hamro ayataharubata vimukha gardaichan (tyasa vimukhatako karana) chitai hamile tinala'i kadabhanda kada sajaya dine nai chaum
